name: Cat & Dog Simulator
description:
You will born in the middle of a crowded and active city. You need to protect yourself, find food,find water and grow up. You will have a family and you must protect them also. Play like a cat / dog from birth to death. If you want to feel like our dear friends cats / dogs and want to live in a city like them, this game is for you!

GAME FEATURES:

- Choose your hero. What do you want to experience? CAT or DOG ?
- Complete the initial tasks. Raise your hero and kill the enemies.
- You will be hungry, thirst and tired. Protect your health!
- Find your mate. Have a cub and protect your family.
- Wait to born and enjoy the experience of having a cub.
- Use your mini map and large map finding enemies and foods.
- Increase your level, strengthen the character.

TECHNICAL DETAILS:

- Mobil optimized HD graphics.
- Sensitive touch controls.
- Handy buttons.
- Quest system.
- Level system.
- Dynamic day and night system.
- Weather and season system.
- Realistic city environments.
- Different camera angles.
- All game data can be saved.
- "How to play" for new starters.

Join the funny world of Cat & Dog Simulator.
